attributes.action: commend and promote Police chief Richard Brunstrom for his progressive views
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: prohibition doesn't work. define all "drugs" as a taxable commodity then the whole of society can benefit. after that you can clamp down on people selling UNTAXED drugs, sure, but prohibiting them, hasn't worked, isn't working and never will work.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
